title: Anti roll bar and or camber compensator?

posts.content:
Has anyone run a rear Anti roll bar and or camber compensator?
I'm running standard height with updated gearbox as I want to look stock and tow a caravan with a 2110
The posts on the samba seem quite old so I'm sure opinions will have changed back and forth over the years.
Before anyone says lower it, it's staying stock height.
